oai_dc:dc.dc:title: View of the Hilton Nashville Downtown and the AT&T Building in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, 2014 March 15
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph was taken from the patio of the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum (222 5th Ave S), located in downtown Nashville. Several iconic buildings in view include the Hilton Nashville Downtown (121 4th Ave S), the AT&T Building (333 Commerce Street), Regions Bank (One Nashville Place, 150 Fourth Avenue N), Baker Donelson Center (211 Commerce Street), and the CMT Office Building (330 Commerce St). A portion of the Walk of Fame Park, a public park located directly across the street from the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum, is pictured in the foreground. Forms part of the Leanne Garland Photograph Collection. 1 digital photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: AT & T (Firm)--History--Sources; Hilton Hotels Corporation--History--Sources
